SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_issue (id, f_issue_title, f_issue_identifier, f_issue_reporter, f_contact, f_institution, f_issue_create_date, f_description, f_priority_level, f_handle_Issue_group, f_handle_Issue_staff, f_status, f_raw_update_time, f_raw_add_time, f_created_By, f_update_By) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{issueTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueReporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleIssueGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleIssueStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rawUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rawAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_issue set f_issue_title = #{issueTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_issue_identifier = #{issueIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_issue_reporter = #{issueReporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_institution = #{institution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_issue_create_date = #{issueCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_priority_level = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_handle_Issue_group = #{handleIssueGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_handle_Issue_staff = #{handleIssueStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_raw_update_time = #{rawUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_raw_add_time = #{rawAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_created_By = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_update_By = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, f_issue_title, f_issue_identifier, f_issue_reporter, f_contact, f_institution, f_issue_create_date, f_description, f_priority_level, f_handle_Issue_group, f_handle_Issue_staff, f_status, f_raw_update_time, f_raw_add_time, f_created_By, f_update_By from t_issue where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
